title: How do I get a PBE account?
body: Is it hard to get one? I seen a lot players with one and I been trying to get one for the past year or so. I signed up but I never get any emails. Just wondering how PBE accounts are given out.

replies.body:
PBE invites are sent out in waves, and our criteria for how we choose PBE testers for each wave will typically depend on what we're testing at the time. One thing that remains consistent is that we look for really active players who are a positive influence on the community and will give great feedback.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for complete details on the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
